request.description: This dataset is a filtered subset of a Hypertension Risk dataset (originally by Md Raihan Kahn), refocused on smoking-related health patterns. It highlights differences between smokers and non-smokers, with surprising findings about age groups among the heaviest smokers. It includes demographic, lifestyle, and health indicators relevant to cardiovascular risk.
request.goal: Enable exploration of health impacts of smoking vs. non-smoking, analyze smoking patterns by age and sex, and study cardiovascular health markers (cholesterol, blood pressure, heart rate) in relation to smoking behavior.

visuals_sugg.title: Age Distribution by Smoking Status
visuals_sugg.description: Histogram of participant ages, split by current smoker status to compare age profiles.
visuals_sugg.why: Reveals whether smokers cluster in specific age ranges versus non-smokers.

visuals_sugg.title: Smoking Prevalence by Sex
visuals_sugg.description: Counts or proportions of current smokers vs non-smokers within each sex.
visuals_sugg.why: Highlights sex differences in smoking rates.

visuals_sugg.title: Cholesterol Levels by Smoking Status and Sex
visuals_sugg.description: Distribution of cholesterol (mg/dL) across smoker vs non-smoker groups, split by sex.
visuals_sugg.why: Assesses how smoking relates to cholesterol with sex-specific patterns.

visuals_sugg.title: Resting Heart Rate by Smoking Status
visuals_sugg.description: Distribution of resting heart rate among smokers and non-smokers.
visuals_sugg.why: Evaluates whether smoking is associated with elevated resting heart rate.

visuals_sugg.title: Age vs Cholesterol Colored by Smoking Status
visuals_sugg.description: Scatter of age against cholesterol, colored by current smoker status.
visuals_sugg.why: Separates age-related cholesterol trends by smoker status.

visuals_sugg.title: Distribution of Cigarettes per Day (Current Smokers)
visuals_sugg.description: Histogram of cigarettes per day for current smokers (exclude nulls), optionally split by sex.
visuals_sugg.why: Characterizes smoking intensity and differences by sex among smokers.

visuals_sugg.title: Age vs Cigarettes per Day with Cholesterol as Bubble Size
visuals_sugg.description: For current smokers, plots age against cigarettes per day; bubble size indicates cholesterol.
visuals_sugg.why: Links smoking intensity and cholesterol across ages, with sex differences.

visuals_sugg.title: Correlation Heatmap of Numeric Health Metrics
visuals_sugg.description: Pairwise correlations among age, heart rate, cigarettes per day, and cholesterol.
visuals_sugg.why: Quantifies linear relationships to guide deeper analysis of risk markers.

visuals_sugg.title: Most Frequent Blood Pressure Readings by Smoking Status
visuals_sugg.description: Counts of the most common blood_pressure readings within smokers vs non-smokers (treat readings as categories; consider showing top N to avoid clutter).
visuals_sugg.why: Provides a coarse view of blood pressure patterns despite BP being stored as text.

visuals_sugg.title: Mean Cholesterol by Age (Binned) and Smoking Status
visuals_sugg.description: Average cholesterol computed within age bins, with separate lines for smokers and non-smokers.
visuals_sugg.why: Shows how cholesterol changes with age and whether patterns differ by smoking status.

request.description: This dataset contains detailed player information from EA Sports FC 26, scraped from sofifa.com. It includes personal info (dob, height, weight, nationality), player ratings (overall, potential, skill attributes), financials (value, wage), and contextual details (club, league, national team). Intended for research and educational purposes.
request.goal: Support football analytics research, player scouting simulations, performance prediction models, sports data visualization, and educational exercises in data science.

visuals_sugg.title: Overall Rating Distribution of Players
visuals_sugg.description: Shows the distribution of player ages across the dataset to understand experience mix.
visuals_sugg.why: Overall rating structure informs scouting pipelines and career stage analysis.

visuals_sugg.title: Overall Rating by League
visuals_sugg.description: Compares the distribution of overall ratings across leagues (median, spread, outliers).
visuals_sugg.why: Highlights league strength and variability for benchmarking and transfer targeting.

visuals_sugg.title: Age vs Overall (Bubble size = Potential)
visuals_sugg.description: Plots player age against overall rating; bubble size encodes potential and color groups by preferred foot.
visuals_sugg.why: Useful for identifying undervalued older/younger players and growth ceilings.

visuals_sugg.title: Market Value vs Overall (Bubble size = Wage)
visuals_sugg.description: Shows how market value relates to overall rating; bubble size reflects wage and colors denote leagues.
visuals_sugg.why: Supports valuation benchmarking and wage-value efficiency scouting by league.

visuals_sugg.title: Correlation Heatmap of Player Attributes
visuals_sugg.description: Correlation matrix across all numerical attributes to reveal relationships and redundancy.
visuals_sugg.why: Guides feature selection for predictive models and reveals linked skills (e.g., pace-dribbling).

visuals_sugg.title: Wage Distribution by League
visuals_sugg.description: Visualizes the distribution and spread of wages per league, including tails and multi-modality.
visuals_sugg.why: Shows compensation structure differences that impact transfer targets and budget planning.

visuals_sugg.title: Top Clubs by Average Potential
visuals_sugg.description: Ranks clubs by mean potential (aggregate: mean), optionally filtered to clubs with sufficient sample size.
visuals_sugg.why: Identifies academies/teams with strong growth prospects for scouting partnerships.

visuals_sugg.title: Player Attribute Profiles (Pace/Shoot/Pass/Dribble/Defend/Physic)
visuals_sugg.description: Compares multi-attribute skill profiles across selected players.
visuals_sugg.why: Ideal for scouting reports and stylistic comparisons between players.

visuals_sugg.title: Dribbling vs Passing by Preferred Foot (Size = Skill Moves)
visuals_sugg.description: Maps technical ability by plotting dribbling against passing; bubble size encodes skill moves and color by preferred foot.
visuals_sugg.why: Highlights creative profiles and two-footedness tendencies for role fit.

visuals_sugg.title: Weak Foot Rating by Preferred Foot
visuals_sugg.description: Compares distributions of weak-foot ratings across left- and right-footed players.
visuals_sugg.why: Assesses ambidexterity differences relevant to tactical flexibility.

visuals_sugg.title: Average Wage by International Reputation
visuals_sugg.description: Shows mean wage for each international reputation level (aggregate: mean).
visuals_sugg.why: Quantifies market premium associated with global reputation.

visuals_sugg.title: Overall vs Potential
visuals_sugg.description: Plots overall against potential to identify underdeveloped talents (gap to potential).
visuals_sugg.why: Useful for talent ID and forecasting development trajectories by league context.

request.description: This dataset provides annual GDP data for 196 countries from 2005 to 2025, measured in USD billions. Data is sourced from the IMF and includes both historical (2005–2024) and projected (2025) values. It captures major global economic events such as the 2008 financial crisis and the 2020 COVID-19 pandemic. Some values may be missing for countries that did not report data.
request.goal: Enable analysis of global and regional GDP growth, build forecasting models, benchmark economic performance, assess impacts of global crises, and support visualization, education, and policy research.

visuals_sugg.title: Global GDP (Sum) 2005–2025
visuals_sugg.description: Total world GDP by year (sum across all countries), showing historical levels and the 2025 projection.
visuals_sugg.y: Global GDP (USD billions, sum across countries)
visuals_sugg.why: Aggregating to the global level highlights macro trends and the impact of events like 2008 and 2020.

visuals_sugg.title: GDP Trajectories by Country (2005–2025)
visuals_sugg.description: Country-level GDP over time; filter to a subset (e.g., top economies or regions) for clarity.
visuals_sugg.why: Enables benchmarking and comparative analysis of economic performance over time.

visuals_sugg.title: GDP Heatmap by Country and Year
visuals_sugg.description: Color-encoded GDP values for each country-year, revealing patterns, outliers, and structural shifts.
visuals_sugg.why: Compactly shows cross-country and temporal variation; missing values are easily spotted.

visuals_sugg.title: Top 10 Economies: 2024 vs 2025 Projection
visuals_sugg.description: Grouped bars comparing 2024 actual vs 2025 projected GDP for the top 10 countries by 2024 GDP.
visuals_sugg.why: Highlights near-term changes and projected shifts among the largest economies.

visuals_sugg.title: YoY GDP Growth Rate by Country
visuals_sugg.description: Year-over-year percent growth of GDP for each country; smooth or filter to selected countries as needed.
visuals_sugg.why: Growth rates normalize size differences and reveal expansions, recessions, and volatility.

visuals_sugg.title: Financial Crisis Impact: 2008 vs 2009 GDP
visuals_sugg.description: Each point is a country; position shows 2008 vs 2009 GDP, bubble size encodes percent change.
visuals_sugg.why: Points below the diagonal indicate contraction in 2009, quantifying the 2008–09 shock.

visuals_sugg.title: Distribution of YoY Growth During COVID-19
visuals_sugg.description: Cross-country distribution of YoY growth for 2020 (vs 2019) and 2021 (vs 2020).
visuals_sugg.why: Summarizes how broadly countries contracted in 2020 and recovered in 2021.

visuals_sugg.title: GDP Distribution Across Countries in Key Years
visuals_sugg.description: Distribution of country GDPs for 2007, 2009, 2020, and 2025 to compare pre/post-crisis and projections.
visuals_sugg.why: Shows changes in dispersion and skewness across major economic periods.

visuals_sugg.title: Share of Global GDP by Country (Top 10) — 2024
visuals_sugg.description: Top 10 countries by 2024 GDP plus an 'Others' slice to show concentration of global GDP.
visuals_sugg.why: Communicates how GDP is concentrated among leading economies.

visuals_sugg.title: Pre- vs Post-COVID Growth: Country CAGRs
visuals_sugg.description: Each point is a country; compares CAGR in 2005–2019 to CAGR in 2019–2024.
visuals_sugg.why: Identifies countries with structural growth slowdowns or accelerations after COVID-19.

visuals_sugg.title: Missing GDP Data Matrix
visuals_sugg.description: Binary heatmap of data availability (present/missing) by country and year.
visuals_sugg.why: Helps assess data quality and informs imputation or filtering strategies.

request.description: This dataset contains hourly cryptocurrency and stock market data collected from Coingecko starting in March 2025. The pipeline demonstrates practical ETL and automation skills with ingestion via Python, offloading into BigQuery, and publishing to Kaggle. It is continuously updated and suitable for SQL practice, EDA, time-series forecasting, and correlation analysis between global assets.
request.goal: Provide a reproducible, continuously updated dataset for monitoring cryptocurrency markets, practicing SQL, exploring time-series analysis, and building machine learning models for forecasting.

visuals_sugg.title: Hourly Price Trends by Asset
visuals_sugg.description: Multi-series line chart of price_usd over time, grouped by symbol. Filter to top N by market_cap to avoid clutter.
visuals_sugg.why: Tracks intraday momentum and regime shifts; ideal for monitoring and forecasting.

visuals_sugg.title: Total Market Capitalization Over Time
visuals_sugg.description: Area chart of the aggregated (sum) market_cap across all symbols per timestamp.
visuals_sugg.why: Shows overall market growth/decline and cycles at an hourly granularity.

visuals_sugg.title: Top Movers: 24h Change by Asset (Latest Hour)
visuals_sugg.description: Sorted bar chart of chg_24h for the most recent timestamp to identify winners and losers.
visuals_sugg.why: Quick snapshot of short-term performance for monitoring and alerts.

visuals_sugg.title: Momentum Map: 7d vs 24h Percentage Change
visuals_sugg.description: Scatter of chg_7d (x) vs chg_24h (y) per symbol at the latest timestamp; quadrants indicate trend continuation or reversals.
visuals_sugg.why: Assesses momentum and mean-reversion candidates at a glance.

visuals_sugg.title: Liquidity vs. Price with Market Cap Size (Latest Hour)
visuals_sugg.description: Bubble plot of vol_24h (x) vs price_usd (y) with bubble size by market_cap for the latest snapshot.
visuals_sugg.why: Highlights liquid, large-cap assets and potential outliers.

visuals_sugg.title: Correlation Matrix of Market Metrics
visuals_sugg.description: Heatmap of pairwise correlations among {price_usd, vol_24h, chg_24h, chg_7d, market_cap} using aligned hourly data.
visuals_sugg.why: Reveals relationships useful for feature engineering and risk management.

visuals_sugg.title: Stacked 24h Volume by Asset Over Time (Top N)
visuals_sugg.description: Stacked area of vol_24h by symbol across timestamps. Optionally normalize to percentage to view share of volume.
visuals_sugg.why: Shows shifts in trading activity and market participation over time.

visuals_sugg.title: Price Dispersion by Asset (Last 7 Days)
visuals_sugg.description: Distribution of hourly price_usd per symbol over the last 7 days.
visuals_sugg.why: Compares volatility and tail behavior across assets.

visuals_sugg.title: Intraday Volume Seasonality
visuals_sugg.description: Average vol_24h by hour_of_day (derived from timestamp) and day_of_week to uncover time-of-day/week patterns.
visuals_sugg.why: Supports scheduling of trades and detecting predictable liquidity windows.

visuals_sugg.title: Market Cap Share by Asset (Latest Hour)
visuals_sugg.description: Pie chart of each symbol’s share of total market_cap at the most recent timestamp. Filter to top N and group the rest as 'Other'.
visuals_sugg.why: Summarizes market dominance and concentration at a glance.

request.description: This dataset represents weekly sales records of one of the largest retail chains in the world. It includes information about store identifiers, weekly sales figures, holidays, weather conditions, fuel prices, consumer price index (CPI), and unemployment rate.
request.goal: To analyze how various economic and environmental factors, such as temperature, fuel price, CPI, and unemployment, influence the store's weekly sales. The analysis can also help build a machine learning model to forecast sales and identify cost-reduction opportunities.

visuals_sugg.title: Weekly Sales Over Time by Store
visuals_sugg.description: Trends of weekly sales for each store across the full time period.
visuals_sugg.why: Highlights seasonality, store-level trends, and anomalies that can inform forecasting and store benchmarking.

visuals_sugg.title: Total Weekly Sales Over Time (All Stores)
visuals_sugg.description: Aggregated total weekly sales across all stores to show overall trend and seasonality.
visuals_sugg.why: Gives an overall view of demand cycles to guide forecasting and capacity planning.

visuals_sugg.title: Weekly Sales Over Time by Holiday vs Non-Holiday
visuals_sugg.description: Compares weekly sales dynamics during holiday weeks versus non-holiday weeks.
visuals_sugg.why: Quantifies holiday impact on sales to support promotional planning and inventory decisions.

visuals_sugg.title: Weekly Sales Distribution by Holiday Flag
visuals_sugg.description: Distribution of weekly sales during holiday (1) and non-holiday (0) weeks.
visuals_sugg.why: Shows median and variability differences that indicate uplift and volatility around holidays.

visuals_sugg.title: Weekly Sales Distribution by Store
visuals_sugg.description: Distribution of weekly sales for each store.
visuals_sugg.why: Reveals store performance dispersion and outliers to identify best/worst performers.

visuals_sugg.title: Weekly Sales vs Temperature
visuals_sugg.description: Relationship between temperature and weekly sales, differentiated by holiday flag.
visuals_sugg.why: Assesses weather sensitivity and whether holidays moderate the temperature-sales effect.

visuals_sugg.title: Weekly Sales vs Unemployment
visuals_sugg.description: Relationship between unemployment rate and weekly sales, split by holiday flag.
visuals_sugg.why: Evaluates macroeconomic pressure on demand and possible differences during holiday periods.

visuals_sugg.title: Fuel Price vs Weekly Sales Sized by CPI
visuals_sugg.description: Fuel price on the x-axis, sales on the y-axis, CPI encoded as bubble size; color by holiday flag.
visuals_sugg.why: Explores combined effects of fuel costs and inflation on sales with holiday context.

visuals_sugg.title: Weekly Sales vs CPI
visuals_sugg.description: Direct relationship between CPI and weekly sales.
visuals_sugg.why: Tests price-level sensitivity of demand to inform pricing and promotions.

visuals_sugg.title: Correlation Matrix of Sales and Drivers
visuals_sugg.description: Correlation heatmap for Weekly_Sales, Temperature, Fuel_Price, CPI, and Unemployment.
visuals_sugg.why: Quickly identifies linear relationships to guide feature selection for forecasting models.

request.description: Dataset containing Climax Realtors' demographic and registration information. Each record represents a realtor with details such as name, gender, state, account name, date of birth, and creation date.
request.goal: Visualize the distribution of realtors across states, gender balance, growth over time, and age demographics.

visuals_sugg.title: Realtors by State
visuals_sugg.description: Counts the number of registered realtors per state.
visuals_sugg.why: Directly addresses the distribution across states and highlights concentration hotspots.

visuals_sugg.title: Gender Distribution of Realtors
visuals_sugg.description: Shows the overall gender balance among registered realtors.
visuals_sugg.why: Provides a clear snapshot of gender balance as requested.

visuals_sugg.title: Monthly Registrations Over Time
visuals_sugg.description: Tracks the trend of new realtor registrations by month.
visuals_sugg.why: Reveals growth over time and seasonality in sign-ups.

visuals_sugg.plot_type: stacked bar chart, grouped bar chart
visuals_sugg.title: Registrations by State and Gender
visuals_sugg.description: Breaks down realtor counts by state and gender.
visuals_sugg.why: Combines geographic distribution with gender balance for richer insights.

visuals_sugg.title: Age Distribution of Realtors
visuals_sugg.description: Distribution of ages calculated from DOB to the current date.
visuals_sugg.why: Directly addresses age demographics and identifies dominant age ranges.

visuals_sugg.title: Age by Gender
visuals_sugg.description: Compares age distributions across genders.
visuals_sugg.why: Explores whether age profiles differ by gender.

visuals_sugg.title: Registrations Heatmap by Month and State
visuals_sugg.description: Heatmap of monthly registration counts across states.
visuals_sugg.why: Highlights temporal and geographic patterns simultaneously.

visuals_sugg.title: Birth Month Distribution
visuals_sugg.description: Counts realtors by birth month derived from DOB.
visuals_sugg.why: Offers additional demographic insight and potential seasonality in birthdays.

request.description: We want to visualize customer demographics and their purchase behavior.
request.goal: Compare purchase patterns across different demographics.

visuals_sugg.title: Average Purchases by Gender
visuals_sugg.description: Shows the average TotalPurchases per customer for each gender.
visuals_sugg.why: Highlights differences in purchase intensity across genders.

visuals_sugg.title: Distribution of Purchases by Country
visuals_sugg.description: Displays the spread and outliers of TotalPurchases for customers in each country.
visuals_sugg.why: Reveals variability and median purchases across countries, not just averages.

visuals_sugg.title: Age vs Total Purchases by Gender
visuals_sugg.description: Plots each customer to show how TotalPurchases relate to Age, colored by Gender.
visuals_sugg.why: Assesses whether age correlates with purchasing and if patterns differ by gender.

visuals_sugg.title: Average Purchases by Age (binned) and Country
visuals_sugg.description: Heatmap of mean TotalPurchases across age bins and countries.
visuals_sugg.why: Captures interaction effects between age and country on purchasing.

visuals_sugg.title: Average Purchases by Join Month and Gender
visuals_sugg.description: Tracks average TotalPurchases of customers grouped by their JoinDate month, split by Gender.
visuals_sugg.why: Compares purchase behavior of join cohorts over time across genders.

visuals_sugg.title: Total Purchases by Country, Stacked by Gender
visuals_sugg.description: Sum of TotalPurchases aggregated by Country with segments for each Gender.
visuals_sugg.why: Shows how much each gender contributes to total purchases within each country.

visuals_sugg.title: Purchase Distribution by Gender
visuals_sugg.description: Overlaid histograms of TotalPurchases for each Gender.
visuals_sugg.why: Compares the shape and skew of purchase distributions across genders.

visuals_sugg.title: Share of Total Purchases by Country
visuals_sugg.description: Proportion of the sum of TotalPurchases contributed by each Country.
visuals_sugg.why: Quickly identifies which countries account for the largest share of purchases.
